alert.note: Alert for Hamblen; Hawkins; Northwest Greene (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 5:44PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN HAWKINS...WEST CENTRAL GREENE AND NORTHEASTERN HAMBLEN COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM EDT... At 644 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Russellville, or 12 miles east of Morristown, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Morristown, Russellville, Mosheim, Bulls Gap, St. Clair, and Mohawk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
